titleStmt.title: Thomas Hynes, R. Enders, and H. Enders, Affidavit
CWG9940

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p: We Thomas Hynes Principal & R Enders & H Enders security do bind ourselves three months after date hereof to pay the commonwealth of Ky the Plaintiff in the Execution the sum of Fifty two dollars & 72 cents, bearing interest from this date, being the amount of principal, interest, & cost of an Execution issued from the office of the McCracken Equity & Criminal Court, on the 21st Day of November 1860 in favor of the said Commonwealth of Ky for the sum of thirty Eight dollars and 00 cents, debt or damages, & dollars and -- cents, interest, Thirteen dollars and 05 cents, cost of suit, one dollars & 27 cents, Sheriff's half commission, forty cents bond, amounting in the whole to the sum of Fifty two dollars & 72 cents aforesaid, against the said Hynes and we the Said R Enders & H Enders his Surety have hereby replevied the same.
Witness our hand this 5th day of January 1861

Thos Hynes
L. S.
R Enders
L. S.
H Endesr
L. S.

A Copy attest
B Small clk

Eq ct
253
Comwlth
vs } Rep Bond
Thos Hynes &c
